channel.title: Json on Flavio Castelli
channel.description: Recent content in Json on Flavio Castelli

item.title: QJson: a Qt-based library for mapping JSON data to QVariant objects
item.description: In order to realize a project of mine I started looking for a Qt library for mapping JSON data to Qt objects. I came over a couple of solutions but none of them made me happy. So in the last weekend I wrote my own library : QJson The library is based on Qt toolkit and converts JSON data to QVariant instances. JSON arrays will be mapped to QVariantList instances, while JSON’s objects will be mapped to QVariantMap.
